ValidationRule.errorConditionFormula: AND( NOT($User.B2b_Bypass_Validation_Rules__c), NOT($Permission.Sales_Admin), NOT(ISPICKVAL(B2b_Status__c, "New")), NOT(ISPICKVAL(B2b_Status__c, "To be Extracted")), NOT(ISPICKVAL(B2b_Status__c, "Integrated")), NOT(ISPICKVAL(B2b_Status__c, "Extracted")), ISCHANGED(B2b_RouteEndDate__c) )
